scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-axis-norender.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-axis-norender.js -c -m -o build/d3-axis-norender.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-axis-norender.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-axis-norender.js build/d3-axis-norender.min.js
